department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Selina Trepp is a Swiss artist living in Chicago. She works in a multitude of media: sculpture, installation, animation, video, drawing and performance. In Chicago she developed a practice of live video performance collaborating with several of Chicago's finest musicians and has been performing on a regular basis in different venues in the city and abroad. Selina Trepps work has been exhibited widely internationally and has received several awards and honors. She is a 2009 Illinois Arts Council Fellowship awardee.
